messages.body:
My Dearly Beloved,

It is by the grace of God that I received Christ,having known the truth, I had no choice than to do what is lawful and right in the sight of God for eternal life and in the sight of man for witness of GodÕs mercy and glory upon my life.


I am Mrs. Melissa Kojo the wife of Mrs. Harry Kojo, my husband worked with the Texaco oil in Ghana for four years before he died in a motor accident early last year.We had no child in this marriage. My Husband died . Before his death we were both born again Christians.


Since his death I have not considered the decition of getting married yet since these are earlytime after his death. When my late husband was alive he deposited trunk boxes of gold with a Bank here in Ghana.Presently, this Gold is still with the Bank and the management just wrote me as the beneficiary to come forward to sign for the release of these trunk boxes of gold or rather issue a letter of authorization to somebodywho will be the foreign beneficiary to receive it on my behalf so the person can help me invest this in his country.I need you to stand as my husbands business associate,because my husbands family claims i have no child for my husband so i have no claim to this treasure.


It is my last wish to see this this trunk boxes of gold live the said bank to any where in the World. Because relatives and friends have plundered so much of my wealth based on the mere allegation that i have no child with their brother(my husband).


Please, I beg you in the name of God to help me Stand and collect the the gold from the Bank. I want a person that is God fearing that will buy the gold through the bank where the gold are deposited or assist me make the sales outside Ghana to avoid problem from my husband family


Exodus  says that the lord will fight my case and I shall hold my peace.
With God all things are possible.


As soon as I receive your reply I shall give you the contact of my barrister who is ready to help us, who is in Accra as he will be the one to assist you in all the process with the bank obtaining the change of ownership document.


Yours Truly,
Mrs. Melissa Kojo

Tell me what you want me to do.
Your Weiner
